```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(lubridate)
#### publications #####
#publications <- read_csv("_content/publications.csv")
#### cv entries #####
cv_entries <- read_csv("_content/cv_entries.csv") %>% 
  mutate(year_begin = year(date)) %>%
  mutate(year_end = case_when(
    date_end == "presente" ~ date_end,
    !is.na(date_end) ~ str_sub(date_end, 1, 4),
    is.na(date_end) ~ date_end
  )) %>%
  mutate(year = ifelse((is.na(year_end) | year_begin == year_end),
                      year_begin,
                      str_c(year_begin, " --- ", year_end)))
```

## Educação {.education .nohead .set-width}
```{r}
cv_entries %>% 
  filter(type == 'education') %>% 
  arrange(desc(date_end)) %>%
  mutate(what = str_c(what, "<br>", where)) %>% 
  select(year, what) %>% 
  kable()
```




## Projetos {.portfolio .nohead .set-width}
```{r}
cv_entries %>% 
  filter(type == 'portfolio') %>%
  mutate(code = ifelse(is.na(code), "", code)) %>%
  mutate(dashboard = ifelse(is.na(dashboard), "", dashboard)) %>%
  mutate(project_link = ifelse(is.na(project_link), "", project_link)) %>%
  mutate(what = str_c(what, ", ", project_link, "  ", dashboard, "  ", code)) %>% 
  select(year, what) %>% 
  kable()
```



## Cursos {.certification .nohead .set-width}
```{r}
cv_entries %>%

```


## Experiência profissional {.work .nohead .vertical-top .set-width}
```{r}
cv_entries %>% 
  filter(type == 'work', is.na(one_column_paged)) %>% 
  mutate(additional_info = replace_na(additional_info, "")) %>% 
  mutate(what = str_c("<span class='work-title'>", what, "</span><br class='work-break'>", where, "<br>", additional_info)) %>% 
  select(year, what) %>% 
  kable()
```
